TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
but you got no wishes left

i wish robots are used for war

Edited June 9, 2021 by JB182
eyyy... nwew pgae!

Sure, you get a new generation of Terminator (Actually called the Kerminator) built by Kerbal Defense, Robotics, and Other Cool Stuff, Inc. which steals your Kemag AK 395 (Kerbalized Demag AC 395) crane and crashes it into your house. Because it is so heavy, it just plows right through everything.

I wish for more legos.

Edited June 9, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

okay, but all legos are junk legos and have been infected by c-19

i wish to fly a kerbocopter (helicopter made of kerbals)

Granted, but you are strapped to a rotor blade and the blur of colour makes you violently ill.

I wish Kerbin had a Marina that built boats and submarines.

granted, bur klobal warming dry the sea and the marina was destroyed bc it has no purpose

i wish for a crane

Wish granted, but the Crane is ornery and keeps biting you and chasing you around the place.

I wish for a second Kerbin that is in the same orbit but is on the other side of Kerbol.

okay, but that kerbin is very hot

i wish for 2 kerbols

Edited June 9, 2021 by JB182
forgot to type the wish

Granted. But their mass attraction is so great that they crash together and form a black hole that wipes out everything in the Kerbol System.

I wish there were gold deposits to be found on Kerbin, that if you mine, open up advanced electronics in the tech tree.

Edited June 9, 2021 by ColdJ

Granted. But the game physics doesn't allow digging.

I wish for KSP bitcoin miner, to mine the bitcoins during the interplanetary trips.

1 hour ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. But the game physics doesn't allow digging.

I wish for KSP bitcoin miner, to mine the bitcoins during the interplanetary trips.

Granted, but you left your convert-o-tron on and it turned into LFO, which you cant use as you have deuterium burning fusion engines.

I wish i could fly

Granted. You can also butter-fly, dragon-fly, and tsetse-fly.

I wish the download icon gets green.

Granted. But theres many fake buttons. 

I wish for better grades in school.

Granted. The highest grade is the "Tardi grade". The lowest are "Retro grade" and "De grade".

I wish the school history was a part of school physics.

Granted, now everyone else is confused and can't figure out what to do.

I wish for more time.

Edited June 9, 2021 by GuessingEveryDay
ninja'd

Granted, but it’s negiive time 

I wish I could play KSP more

Granted. Now you can play the KSP music on a piano.

I wish for two cool (temperature) weeks.

Granted. But cool in temperature is unspecified. So you get two 100 C Straight weeks. 

I wish for more battery for my Kindle.

Granted.

You get 3 kilograms of batteries, but they are for the discontinued Windows Phone.

 

I wish for moar tea

Granted. Now you wish the plumber comes soon to repair your restroom pipes before your countdown finishes.

I wish he will.

Granted. But everybody is confused that his name is now William.

I wish I knew where all my nodes had to go without having to constantly load, check, edit, repeat.

Granted, you now know where your lymph nodes are located.

I wish for a working drum fan (Look it up if you want to know what a drum fan is. My internet is really slow so I am not going to bother attaching an image right now)

Granted. A road worker, who is an amateur drummer, comes to ask what do you want.

I wish, they will repair the road anyway.

Edited June 9, 2021 by kerbiloid

Granted. Confused about where the road is going, they use a Liebherr PR 736 dozer, a Liebherr R 936 excavator, and a Cat 315CL excavator to demolish your house, use a Cat CS533E soil compactor, Cat Liebherr A922 wheeled excavator, Kenworth dump truck, Vögele Super 1800-3 paver, and Cat CCS9 asphalt compacter to make a road where your house once was.

I wish for a clock.

Granted.  Kerbiloid clocks you for parking all your industrial vehicles on their road.

I wish I knew how to move a kerbals seating position in an IVA without needing a mesh editing program.

You get an IVA Kerbal pushed through an edited wire mesh screen, turning into a strange jello-like green substance.

I wish for a dump truck of jello.

Edited June 9, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman
A spelling eror.
